page.title: 15T.V.PRORAMME SUMMARY(2)
page.content: {*}The programme next concentrated on social aspects.The only public house is the Onley Arms named after the former Lords of the Manor.On the site of another is the Institute,which now houses a lending library.There is a small shop and Post Office.A Community Association was formed after the 1977 Jubilee Celebrations. {*}It is rare to see houses for sale in Stised;inhabitants seem unwilling to leave the village.The village primary school is an important source of contact between villagers,through their children.There will be infilling,but no big new building development,as the village is a conservation area. {*}The horticultural show is an annual event.Petanque and rounders are popular games.
